getRWUC

             int max,
             com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<List<com.isotrol.impe3.web20.api.ResourceByCommunityCounterDTO>> callback)

Parameters:
serviceId - Service Id.
max - Maximum number of results.
callback - A list with at most max resources with unmoderatared comments.

getRWUCInCommunity

void getRWUCInCommunity(String serviceId,
                        String communityId,
                        int max,
                        com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<List<com.isotrol.impe3.web20.api.ResourceCounterDTO>> callback)

Parameters:
serviceId - Service Id.
communityId - Community Id.
max - Maximum number of results.
callback - The resources with unmoderatared comments in a the specified community.
